extension.description: A VSCode extension for visualizing URDF files and xacro files.
extension.configuration.title: URDF Visualizer
extension.configuration.packages.descrip: The path of ROS/ROS2 packages, it is used for parse `package://<package_name>` in URDF files.
extension.configuration.renderOnSave.des: Render the URDF/Xacro file when saving.
extension.configuration.reRenderWhenSwit: Re render the URDF/Xacro file when switching active file.
The background color of the 3D viewer.
The color must be a valid hex color code, i.e. #FFFFFF.
webview.clickDropFirstPoint: Click to drop the first point
webview.doubleClickCompleteMeasure: Double click or press Enter to complete the measurement
webview.escCancleMeasure: Press Esc to cancle the measurement
